channel.title: Sprites? Client Slide or Server Side? :S
channel.description:
Helo i've added custom sprites to my server.... Although you can only see your own custom sprites... no one else can see ur custom sprite accept you..
How do i make it so that every1 can see ur custom sprite??
Note: I'm currently using bluurrs client Note: I'm using deltascape base source Note: It's NOTHING to do with MODELS... Note: Every1s got the client im using.. Note: I gave them the client after i updated the sprites Help is appreciated

item.title: Sprites? Client Slide or Server Side? :S
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

lmao…

They are client sided, people must use the client to see the sprites…

Read full topic
item.source: Sprites? Client Slide or Server Side? :S
